languages.text: "Иокаста, приставь к нему конвой: пусть расскажет нижним палубам, что Немезит — лжец и подлец. Вы же убедите его быть красноречивым?"
"Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"
languages.original_text: "Иокаста, приставь к нему конвой: пусть расскажет нижним палубам, что Немезит — лжец и подлец. Вы же убедите его быть красноречивым?"

traits.locale_text: "Jocasta, get him an escort so he can tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"
"Jocasta, get him an escort so he can tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"
"Jocasta, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"
"Jocasta, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"
"Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"
"Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"

languages.text: "Sauerback, gebt ihm eine Eskorte, damit er den unteren Decks sagen kann, dass Nemesit ein Lügner und Schurke ist. Ihr werdet ihn dazu bewegen, wortgewandt zu sein, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback, gebt ihm eine Eskorte, damit er den unteren Decks sagen kann, dass Nemesit ein Lügner und Schurke ist. Ihr werdet ihn dazu bewegen, wortgewandt zu sein, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: «Sauerback, procúrele una escolta para que pueda contar en las cubiertas inferiores que Nemesitio es un embustero y un canalla. Usted le persuadirá para que sea elocuente, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"

traits.locale_text: «Sauerback, procúrele una escolta para que pueda contar en las cubiertas inferiores que Nemesitio es un embustero y un canalla. Usted le persuadirá para que sea elocuente, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック、彼に護衛を付けて、ネメサイトが嘘つきの悪党だと下層デッキに伝えてくれ。よく話すように彼を説得できるな？」
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック、彼に護衛を付けて、ネメサイトが嘘つきの悪党だと下層デッキに伝えてくれ。よく話すように彼を説得できるな？」

languages.text: “苏尔贝克，派人护送他到底层甲板，让他告诉所有人涅墨斯特是个骗子、是个人渣。你可以说服他，让他变得能说会道，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克，派人护送他到底层甲板，让他告诉所有人涅墨斯特是个骗子、是个人渣。你可以说服他，让他变得能说会道，是吧？”

languages.text: « Sauerback, fournissez-lui une escorte, qu'il aille dénoncer la scélératesse et les mensonges de Némésite sur les ponts inférieurs. Je compte sur vous pour l'inciter à se montrer convaincant. »
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"

traits.locale_text: « Sauerback, fournissez-lui une escorte, qu'il aille dénoncer la scélératesse et les mensonges de Némésite sur les ponts inférieurs. Je compte sur vous pour l'inciter à se montrer convaincant. »

languages.text: "Sauerback. Yanına ona eşlik edecek birini ver ki alt güvertelere Nemezit'in bir yalancı ve bir hain olduğunu anlatabilsin. Güzel konuşması konusunda onu ikna edeceksindir, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, get him an escort so that he may tell the lower decks that Nemesite is a liar and a scoundrel. You will persuade him to be eloquent, will you not?"
